content: **this is for a pdf pattern only*** i had dwarf bunnies as a young child ours were litter box trained and roamed the house not all parents are up for that so as another addition to the pet collection i give you mallow the rabbit squishy lovable and fluffy if you wish i ve created this step by step written pattern- complete with photos tips tricks and helpful links american terms difficulty comfortable beginner comfortable with chain bumps row and round changes increasing and decreasing and single_crochet yarns i used body lion brand landscapes medium 4 in coral reef 3 5 oz 2 skeins accent red heart heat wave medium 4 in luggage 3 5 oz ***** a note on yarns***** almost all of the yarns i use in my stash has been given to me so they vary widely however i suggest the same weight and if possible the same brand if you are buying new skeins of at least 3 5 oz of each color this ensures that each piece will match in size and shape as medium weight can vary from brand to brand colors needed for pieces body color and accent color if you choose to have one for the tummy and inner ear pieces recommended hook size 4 mm used in pattern or 3 5mm for light weight yarn supplies yarn yarn needle fiber filling scissors 15mm safety eyes crochet hook scrap yarn or stitch markers pet brush optional for brushing out mane
